Literature.Title: Insights in the Antimicrobial Potential of the Natural Nisin Variant Nisin H.
Literature.Author: Reiners J, Lagedroste M, Gottstein J, Adeniyi ET, Kalscheuer R, Poschmann G, Stühler K, Smits SHJ, Schmitt L

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Lactococcus lactis subsp. cremoris NZ9000(IC50=0.0053±0.001µM),Lactococcus lactis subsp. cremoris NZ9000NisI(IC50=0.0432±0.0087µM),Lactococcus lactis subsp. cremoris NZ9000SaNSR(IC50=0.0524±0.0099µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=0.19µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 700699(MIC=0.78µM),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=1.56µM),Enterococcus faecium ATCC 35667(MIC=0.39µM),Bacillus subtilis 168(MIC=0.1µM),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 51299(MIC=0.56µM),Enterococcus faecium ATCC 700221(MIC=0.39µM)
